code: import{createStore,compose,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{initSagas}from'../sagas/initSagas';import rootReducer from'../reducers';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middleWare=[sagaMiddleware,thunk];var store=createStore(rootReducer,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleWare)));initSagas(sagaMiddleware);console.info('Saga middleware implemented');export default store;
